title: permaban??
body: rito why did i get permabanned ? i

replies.body:
When you login, you are displayed with a reform card with the exact reason and evidence. Happy to paste the logs here if you'd like.

Why did it result in a perma ban? Because when you got your 14-day ban last month for the same reason, you were told that the next penalty would be a perma-ban.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YNJNagr3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-05-22T22:13:44.425+0000)

Hey Tantram --

If you have a moment, [could you take a look at this thread?](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/8FBQvz7A-my-account-just-got-perma-banned-without-1-warning) It seems the fellow was immediate permanently banned for behavioral reasons, but the logs included seem only moderately toxic and I can't see a history of feeding in his account. Was curious, as it was one of the rare cases here where we get logs presented willingly and can't seem to help the poster find a solid reason for the immediate escalation.

Would love to clear that one up, both for his sake and for mine -- it's been puzzling me. :P

chat logs?

Otherwise we can't help.
If you didn't get an e-mail from Riot and your client isn't telling you, [send in a ticket to Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll help you figure it out.
